Package weka.gui

Class JListHelper

java.lang.Object
weka.gui.JListHelper
public class JListHelper extends Object
A helper class for JList GUI elements with DefaultListModel or derived models.
Version:
$Revision: 8034 $
Author:
FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
